summary: Depicts the end days of a decadent zamindar (landlord) in Bengal, and his efforts to uphold his family prestige even when faced with economic adversity.
cast: Chhabi Biswas|Sardar Akhtar|Gangapada Basu|Bismillah Khan|Salamat Ali Khan|Waheed Khan|Roshan Kumari|Tulsi Lahiri|Tarapada Nandy|Padmadevi|Kali Sarkar|Pinaki Sengupta|Pratap Mukherjee
title: Jalsaghar
